item.title: AI prompts can boost writers’ creativity but result in similar stories, study finds - The Guardian
item.description:
1. AI prompts can boost writers’ creativity but result in similar stories, study finds  The Guardian
  2. Research shows AI can boost creativity for some, but at a cost  NPR
  3. Stories written with AI assistance found to be more creative, better written and more enjoyable  Tech Xplore
  4. Experiment finds AI boosts creativity individually — but lowers it collectively  TechCrunch
  5. AI Enhances Story Creativity but Risks Reducing Novelty  Neuroscience News
